Kuryerlarga qanday talablar qo'yiladi?: What are the requirements for couriers?
Uzum Tezkorning hamkorida kuryer sifatid: To work as a courier for a Uzum Tezkor partner, you need to be over 18 years old, have a smartphone based on Android 6.0, know the Uzbek language, and have a good command of spoken Russian.
Kuryer bo'lib ishlash uchun qanday hujja: What documents are needed to work as a courier?
Pasportning asl nusxasi, bank kartangiz: You will need an original copy of your passport, your bank card details, and if you work in a car, you will also need a driver's license and your car's registration certificate.
Kuryerning mukofoti nimaga bog'liq?: What does the courier's reward depend on?
Ish haqi navbatchilik davomiyligiga, baj: Salary depends on the duration of duty, the number of orders completed, as well as compliance with discipline and service standards.
Qaysi shaxarlarda ishlashim mumkin?: In which cities can I work?
Hozirgi vaqtda bizning xizmatimiz Toshke: Currently, our service is available in Tashkent, Samarkand, Andijan, Fergana, Navoi, Namangan and Bukhara regions. However, the delivery area is growing rapidly. Soon we will launch our service in other cities of Uzbekistan.
Qancha vaqt ishlash kerak?: How long do you have to work?
Siz o'zingizga qulay vaqtga qarab navbat: You can choose the length of your shift based on your convenience. They can range from 4 hours to 12 hours.
Men buyurtmalarni velosipedda/piyoda yet: Can I deliver orders by bike/on foot?
Sizlar yetkazib berish uskunalarini va f: Do you provide delivery equipment and uniforms?
Men asosiy ishimdan yoki o'qishimdandan: Can I work as a courier in addition to my main job or studies?
Ha, siz har bir mavsum uchun qulay forma: Yes, you will receive comfortable uniforms and equipment for every season.
It won't take more than 5 minutes.
Agar kerak bo'lsa o'zimiz qo'ng'iroq qil: If necessary, we will call and clarify the details ourselves
Uzum Tezkor jamoasiga xush kelibsiz!: Welcome to the Uzum Tezkor team!
Добро пожаловать в команду Uzum Tezkor: Good treatment and command Uzum Tezkor
Iltimos, faollashtirilgan telefon raqami: Please enter your activated phone number correctly.
Buyurtmalarni qaysi transportda yetkazib: What transport are you willing to use to deliver orders?
Qaysi shaharda ishlamoqchi bo‘lganingizn: Choose which city you want to work in.
Buyurtmalarni o'z vaqtida va sifatli yet: Deliver orders on time and with high quality and earn high profits twice a month
Tezkor ta'lim va buyurtmalar payti qo'll: Quick training and support during orders
Siz ish kunlari va vaqtini o'zingiz tanl: You choose the working days and time yourself - from 4 hours to 12 hours.
O'qish yoki asosiy ish bilan birlashtiri: Easy to combine with studies or main job
Buyurtmalarni velosipedda, mashinada, sk: You can deliver orders by bicycle, car, scooter, or moped.
Kuryer bo'ling va bonus oling!: Become a courier and get a bonus!
